    -- water.jsclass Water {    constructor(){        console.log('Water constructor.');    }}module.exports = Water;-- o2.jsclass O2 {    constructor(){        console.log('O2 constructor.');    }}module.exports = O2;-- animal.js/*** ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»ï¼šO2ï¼ŒWater---->*/const O2 = require('./o2.js');const Water = require('./water.js');class Animal {    constructor(){        if(new.target === Animal)            throw new Error(`${Animal} cannot be initialized.`);        console.log('Animal constructor.');        this.life = true;    }    metaboly(o2 = new O2(), water = new Water()){        return;    }    breed(){}}module.exports = Animal;-- bird.js/*** ç»§æ‰¿animal* å®çº¿ç©ºå¿ƒä¸‰è§’*/const Animal = require('./animal.js');const Wing = require('./wing.js');class Bird extends Animal {    constructor(feather) {        super();        console.log('Bird constructor.');        this.feather = feather;        this.wings = new Wing();    }    deposit() {}}module.exports = Bird;-- wing.js/*** ä¸é¸Ÿæ˜¯ç»„åˆå…³ç³»* é¸Ÿ å®å¿ƒè±å½¢* ç¿…è†€ å®å¿ƒç®­å¤´* å·¦å³æ•°å­—ï¼š 1   2ï¼Œ 1å¯¹2*/class Wing {    constructor(){        console.log('Wing constructor.')    }}module.exports = Wing;-- wildGoose.js/*** ç»§æ‰¿é¸Ÿ* å®çº¿ç©ºå¿ƒä¸‰è§’*/const Bird = require('./bird.js');class WildGoose extends Bird {    constructor() {        super(); entry.title: æœ‰å‘å›¾çš„å¼ºè¿é€šåˆ†é‡ç®—æ³•
entry.content:
æœ‰å‘å›¾çš„å¼ºè¿é€šåˆ†é‡ï¼š Tarjanç®—æ³• 

const Stack = require('./Stack.js');// æœ‰å‘å›¾çš„å¼ºè¿é€šåˆ†é‡ç®—æ³•// dfsæœç´¢class Tarjan {    constructor(n, connections, iDirected = true){        // æ—¶é—´æˆ³dfn: dfn[i] dfsæœç´¢ç¼–å·        this.dfn = [];        // è¿½æº¯å€¼low: low[i] åˆå§‹å€¼ä¸º dfn[i]ï¼Œåç»­å¯èƒ½ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿæ›´æ–°ï¼Œ low[i] = Math.min(low[i], [low|dfn][c]) iä¸ºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹        this.low = [];        this.n = n;        this.connections = connections;        // dfsç¼–å·ï¼š æ—¶é—´æˆ³        this.index = 0;        this.stack = new Stack();        // æœ‰å‘å›¾çš„å¼ºè¿é€šåˆ†é‡        this.sccs = new Stack();        // æ¡¥        this.bridges = [];        // trueæœ‰å‘å›¾ï¼Œ falseå•è¾¹æ— å‘å›¾        this.iDirected = iDirected;    }    t(x, lastEdge) {        this.dfn[x] = this.low[x] = ++this.index;        this.stack.push(x);        for(let c of this.connections) {            // c = [x, y]            // æ— å‘å›¾é‡è¾¹å¤„ç†            if(!this.iDirected && c === lastEdge) continue;            // é»˜è®¤ä¸ºæœ‰å‘å›¾            let directedX = c[0];            let directedY = c[1];            // æ— å‘å›¾            if(!this.iDirected){                if(x === c[1]){                    directedX = c[1];                    directedY = c[0];                }            }            if(directedX === x){                const y = directedY;                if(!this.dfn[y]){                    this.t(y, c);                    // è‹¥ğ‘¦æ²¡è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡ï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜(ğ‘¥,ğ‘¦)æ˜¯æ ‘æè¾¹ï¼Œé€’å½’è®¿é—®ğ‘¦,ä»ğ‘¦å›æº¯åï¼Œä»¤ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¥]=ğ‘šğ‘–ğ‘›(ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¥],ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¦])                    this.low[x] = Math.min(this.low[x], this.low[y]);                    // å…³é”®è¿æ¥ - æ¡¥                    if(this.low[y] > this.dfn[x]){                        this.bridges.push(c);                    }                } else if(this.stack.has(y)){                    // è‹¥ğ‘¦è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡ä¸”ğ‘¦åœ¨æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œä»¤ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¥]=ğ‘šğ‘–ğ‘›(ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¥],ğ‘‘ğ‘“ğ‘›[ğ‘¦])                    this.low[x] = Math.min(this.low[x], this.dfn[y]);                }            }        }        // ğ‘™ğ‘œğ‘¤[ğ‘¥]=ğ‘‘ğ‘“ğ‘›[ğ‘¥]æˆç«‹ï¼Œåˆ™æ ˆä¸­ä»ğ‘¥åˆ°æ ˆé¡¶çš„æ‰€æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ„æˆä¸€ä¸ªå¼ºè¿é€šåˆ†é‡        if(this.dfn[x] === this.low[x]){            const scc = new Stack();            let y;            do{                y = this.stack.pop();                scc.push(y);            } while(x !== y);            this.sccs.push(scc);        }    }    execute() {        for(let i = 0; i < this.n; i++) {            if(!this.dfn[i])                this.t(i);        }        return this.sccs;    }    getSccs() {        return this.sccs;    }    getBridges() {        return this.bridges;    }    contains(connection) {        const x = connection[0];        const y = connection[1];        for(let scc of this.sccs.getArray()){            if(scc.has(x) && scc.has(y)){                return true;            }        }        return false;    }    print() {        this.sccs.print();    }}module.exports = Tarjan;

entry.title: æ±‚æ•°æ®æµçš„ä¸­ä½æ•°
entry.content:
æ€è·¯ï¼šå°†æœ‰åºåˆ—è¡¨åˆ†ä¸ºå¤§å°æ ¹å †ï¼Œå·¦ä¾§ä¸ºå¤§æ ¹å †ï¼Œå³ä¾§ä¸ºå°æ ¹å †ï¼Œä»è€Œå°†ä¸­ä½æ•°å˜æˆæ±‚å–å¤§å°æ ¹å †çš„æ ¹å€¼ã€‚ 

class Heap {  constructor(iLarge = true){    this.heap = new Array();    this.isLarge = iLarge;  }  swap(id1, id2) {    let temp = this.heap[id1];    this.heap[id1] = this.heap[id2];    this.heap[id2] = temp;  }  up(id) {    let pid = Math.floor((id - 1) / 2);    if(this.isLarge){      if(id !== 0 && this.heap[pid] < this.heap[id]){        this.swap(pid, id);        this.up(pid);      }    } else {      if(id !== 0 && this.heap[pid] > this.heap[id]){        this.swap(pid, id);        this.up(pid);      }    }  }  down(id) {    let leftChildId = id * 2 + 1;    let rightChildId = id * 2 + 2;    let len = this.heap.length;    if(this.isLarge){      if(leftChildId < len && this.heap[leftChildId] > this.heap[id]){        this.swap(leftChildId, id);        this.down(leftChildId);      }      if(rightChildId < len && this.heap[rightChildId] > this.heap[id]){        this.swap(rightChildId, id);        this.down(rightChildId);      }    } else {      if(leftChildId < len && this.heap[leftChildId] < this.heap[id]){        this.swap(leftChildId, id);        this.down(leftChildId);      }      if(rightChildId < len && this.heap[rightChildId] < this.heap[id]){        this.swap(rightChildId, id);        this.down(rightChildId);      }    }  }  insert(x) {    this.heap.push(x);    this.up(this.heap.length - 1);  }  remove(){    this.swap(0, this.heap.length - 1);    const ret = this.heap.pop();    this.down(0);    return ret;  }  pop(){    return this.heap.pop();  }  getRoot(){    return this.heap[0]  }  getLength(){    return this.heap.length;  }}/** * initialize your data structure here. */var MedianFinder = function() {  // æ€è·¯ï¼šå¤§å°æ ¹å † ï¼Œ å·¦è¾¹ä¸ºå¤§æ ¹å †ï¼Œ å³è¾¹ä¸ºå°æ ¹å †  this.left = new Heap(true);  this.right = new Heap(false);};/** * @param {number} num * @return {void} */MedianFinder.prototype.addNum = function(num) {    // å…·ä½“ç®—æ³•ï¼š å¦‚æœnum å¤§äº left çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™æ·»åŠ åˆ°å³ä¾§ï¼Œæ·»åŠ å®Œæˆåéœ€è¦åšå¤§å°æ ¹çš„å¹³è¡¡æ“ä½œã€‚    if(num > this.left.getRoot()){      this.right.insert(num);      // å¤§å°æ ¹å¹³è¡¡æ“ä½œ      if(this.right.getLength() > this.left.getLength()){        this.left.insert(this.right.remove());      }    } else{      this.left.insert(num);      if(this.left.getLength() > (this.right.getLength() + 1)){        this.right.insert(this.left.remove());      }    }};/** * @return {number} */MedianFinder.prototype.findMedian = function() {  let len = this.left.getLength() + this.right.getLength();  if(len % 2 === 0){    return (this.left.getRoot() + this.right.getRoot()) / 2;  } else{    return this.left.getRoot();  }};

class Heap {

    this.hea

entry.title: JavaScriptå“ˆå¸Œ
entry.content:
è¡¨ç»“æ„ä¸JSå¯¹è±¡ç»“æ„è½¬æ¢ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®ç»“æ„Aè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°æ®ç»“æ„Bã€‚ 

// å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®ç»“æ„const nodeAStruct = function(id, pid, data) {  this.id = id;  this.pid = pid;  this.data = data;}const nodeBStruct = function(id, children, data) {  this.id = id;  this.children = children;  this.data = data;}// æ‰“å°ï¼šæ·±åº¦éå†const print = (tree) => {  console.log(tree.data);  if(tree.children && tree.children.length > 0){    const children = tree.children;    children.forEach(child => {      print(child);    });  }}// æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šé€’å½’éå†const convert2Tree = (nodes = [], pid) => {  const result = [];  let temp = [];  nodes.forEach((node) => {    if(node.pid === pid){      const nodeB = new nodeBStruct(node.id, [], node.data);      temp = convert2Tree(nodes, node.id);      if(temp.length > 0){        nodeB.children = temp;      }      result.push(nodeB);    }  });  return result;}// æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šhashå¤„ç†const convertNodes2Hash = (nodes = []) => {  const hash = {};  nodes.forEach((node) => {    const nodeB = new nodeBStruct(node.id, [], node.data);    if(hash[node.pid]){      hash[node.pid].push(nodeB);    } else{      hash[node.pid] = [nodeB];    }  });  return hash;}const convertR = (hash, pid) => {  hash[pid].forEach(hp => {    const hc = hash[hp.id];    hp.children = hc?hc : [];    if(hc){      convertR(hash, hp.id);    }  });  return hash;}const convert2TreeByHash = (nodes = []) => {  const hash = convertNodes2Hash(nodes);  convertR(hash, -1);  return hash[-1];}const nodes = [];nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(0, -1, 'data0'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(1, 0, 'data1'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(2, 0, 'data2'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(3, 1, 'data3'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(4, 1, 'data4'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(5, 2, 'data5'))nodes.push(new nodeAStruct(6, 2, 'data6'))let tree = convert2TreeByHash(nodes);print(tree[0]);console.log(tree[0])console.log('-----------------------');tree = convert2Tree(nodes, -1);print(tree[0]);console.log(tree[0])

entry.title: æœ€å¤§æ°”çƒ
entry.content:
• LeetCode - â€œæ°”çƒâ€ çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°é‡
    ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² textï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ text ä¸­çš„å­—æ¯æ¥æ‹¼å‡‘å°½å¯èƒ½å¤šçš„å•è¯ â€œballoonâ€ï¼ˆæ°”çƒï¼‰ã€‚
    å­—ç¬¦ä¸² text ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå­—æ¯æœ€å¤šåªèƒ½è¢«ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚è¯·ä½ è¿”å›æœ€å¤šå¯ä»¥æ‹¼å‡‘å‡ºå¤šå°‘ä¸ªå•è¯ â€œballoonâ€ã€‚ 

    /** * @param {string} text * @return {number} è¾“å…¥ï¼štext = "nlaebolko" è¾“å‡ºï¼š1 è¾“å…¥ï¼štext = "loonbalxballpoon" è¾“å‡ºï¼š2 è¾“å…¥ï¼štext = "leetcode" è¾“å‡ºï¼š0 æç¤ºï¼š  - 1 <= text.length <= 10^4  - text å…¨éƒ¨ç”±å°å†™è‹±æ–‡å­—æ¯ç»„æˆ */var getAlphaFromText = (text, alpha) => {  const reg = new RegExp(`${alpha}`, 'g');  if(reg.test(text)){    return text.match(reg).length;  }  return 0;}//balloonvar maxNumberOfBalloons = function(text) {    if(!text || (text && text.length === 0)) return 0;    const balloonByteChars = ['b', 'a', 'l', 'o', 'n'];    const ret = balloonByteChars.reduce((count, b) => {      let len = getAlphaFromText(text, b);      if(b === 'l' || b === 'o'){        len = Math.floor(len / 2);      }      if(count > len){        count = len;      }      return count;    }, text.length);    return ret;};

entry.title: compose
entry.content:
JavaScriptå‡½æ•°å¼ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼šcomposeæ–¹æ³• 

const compose = (arr) => {    return arr.reduce((a, b) => (...args) => a(b(...args)))}const composeT = (arr) => {  return arr.reduce((a, b) => {    return (...args) => {      console.log(`${a.name}(${b.name}(${args}))`);      return a(b(...args));    }  }, ()=>{})}const a = (a, b) => {console.log("a: ", a); return a;}const b = (a, b) => {console.log("b: ", a); return a;}const c = (a, b) => {console.log("c: ", a, b); return [a, b];}composeT([a,b,c])('1','2')(c(1,2))c:  1 2(b(1,2))b:  [ '1', '2' ](a(1,2))a:  [ '1', '2' ]

entry.title: Stackå®ç°
entry.content:
æ ˆFILOï¼šå…ˆè¿›åå‡º 

// å…ˆè¿›åå‡º FILO: first in last outclass Stack {    constructor(){        this.stack = new Array();    }    pop() {        return this.stack.pop();    }    push(x) {        this.stack.push(x);        return this;    }    empty() {        return this.size() === 0;    }    size() {        return this.stack.length;    }    top() {        return this.stack[this.stack.length - 1];    }    has(x) {        return this.stack.indexOf(x) !== -1;    }    getArray() {        return this.stack;    }    getRoot() {        return this.stack[0];    }    print() {        for(let s of [...this.stack]){        if(s.print){            console.log(`${s}ï¼š`);            s.print();        } else{            console.log(s);        }        }        return this;    }}module.exports = Stack;

entry.title: LRUç®—æ³•
entry.content:
LRU (least recently used) ç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶ï¼šå®ç°get, putæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ 

/** * å…ƒç´ ç½®é¡¶ */const popItemFromArray = (arr, key) =>{  arr.splice(arr.indexOf(key), 1);  arr.push(key);  return arr;}/** * å®ç°æ€è·¯ï¼šES6 Map [+ æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ï¼‰] **/var LRUCache = function(capacity) {    this.cache = new Map();    this.lruArr = new Array();    this.curLen = 0;    this.capacity = capacity;};LRUCache.prototype.get = function(key) {    if(this.cache.has(key)){      const value = this.cache.get(key);      popItemFromArray(this.lruArr, key);      return value;    }    return -1;};LRUCache.prototype.lruDel = function(){  const minKey = this.lruArr.shift();  const isucc = this.cache.delete(minKey);  if(isucc){    this.curLen--;  }  return isucc;}// iorder : false descend true ascendLRUCache.prototype.sort = function(iorder) {  return this.lruArr.sort((c1, c2) => {    return c1 - c2;  });}LRUCache.prototype.put = function(key, value) {    if(this.cache.has(key)){      // pop key from lru array      popItemFromArray(this.lruArr, key);      return this.cache.set(key, value);    }    if(this.curLen === this.capacity){      this.lruDel();    }    this.curLen++;    this.lruArr.push(key);    return this.cache.set(key, value);};

entry.title: Heapå®ç°
entry.content:
å°æ ¹å †å®ç°ï¼Œå¤§æ ¹å †ç±»ä¼¼ 

// é€šè¿‡ up downæ–¹æ³•å®ç° å †çš„æœ‰æ•ˆæ€§class Heap {  constructor(){    this.heap = new Array();  }  swap(id1, id2) {    let temp = this.heap[id1];    this.heap[id1] = this.heap[id2];    this.heap[id2] = temp;  }  up(id) {    let pid = Math.floor((id - 1) / 2);    if(id !== 0 && this.heap[pid] > this.heap[id]){      this.swap(pid, id);      this.up(pid);    }  }  down(id) {    let leftChildId = id * 2 + 1;    let rightChildId = id * 2 + 2;    let len = this.heap.length;    if(leftChildId < len && this.heap[leftChildId] < this.heap[id]){      this.swap(leftChildId, id);      this.down(leftChildId);    }    if(rightChildId < len && this.heap[rightChildId] < this.heap[id]){      this.swap(rightChildId, id);      this.down(rightChildId);    }  }  insert(x) {    this.heap.push(x);    this.up(this.heap.length - 1);  }  remove(){    this.swap(0, this.heap.length - 1);    const ret = this.heap.pop();    this.down(0);    return ret;  }}

    æ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œæ±‚å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„æ•°å­—å¹³æ–¹å’Œï¼Œé‡å¤æ­¤è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æ•°å­—1ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ºå¿«ä¹æ•°ã€‚

    var getSquaresSum = function(n){    var ss = n.toString().split('');    return ss.reduce(function(count, s){        return count + Math.pow(parseInt(s), 2);    }, 0)}var isHappy = function(n) {    var rets = [n];    var count = n;    while(true){        count = getSquaresSum(count);        if(count === 1){            return true;        }        var index = rets.indexOf(count);        if(index !== -1){            return false;        }        rets.push(count);    }};

entry.title: é€‚é…å™¨æ¨¡å¼

1. é€‚é…å™¨æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆAdapterï¼‰

  2. ä»£ç å®ä¾‹ github

    -- target.jsclass Target {    constructor() {        if(new.target === Target)            throw new Error(`${Target} cannot be initialized.`);        console.log('Target constructor.');    }    request() {        throw new Error(`${this.request} should be overwrite.`);    }}module.exports = Target;-- adapter.jsconst Target = require('./target');const Adaptee = require('./adaptee');class Adapter extends Target {    constructor(adaptee = new Adaptee()) {        super();        this.adaptee = adaptee;        console.log('Adapter constructor.');    }    request() {        this.adaptee.specificRequest();    }}module.exports = Adapter;-- adaptee.jsclass Adaptee {    constructor() {        console.log('Adaptee constructor.');    }    specificRequest() {        console.log('Adaptee specificRequest.');    }}module.exports = Adaptee;-- client.jsconst Adapter = require('./adapter');const Adaptee = require('./adaptee');const adapter = new Adapter(new Adaptee());adapter.request();console.log('------');const adapter2 = new Adapter();adapter2.request();console.log('------');

entry.title: çŠ¶æ€æ¨¡å¼

    -- state.jsclass State {    constructor() {        if(new.target === State)            throw new Error(`${State} cannot be initialized.`);        console.log('State constructor.');    }    handle() {        throw new Error(`${this.handle} should be overwrite.`);    }}module.exports = State;-- concreteStateA.jsconst State = require('./state');class ConcreteStateA extends State {    constructor() {        super();        console.log('ConcreteStateA constructor.');    }    handle(context) {        console.log('Current State: ConcreteStateA. ');        context.setState('ConcreteStateB');    }}module.exports = ConcreteStateA;-- concreteStateB.jsconst State = require('./state');class ConcreteStateB extends State {    constructor() {        super();        console.log('ConcreteStateB constructor.');    };    handle(context) {        console.log('Current State: ConcreteStateB. ');        context.setState('ConcreteStateC');    };}module.exports = ConcreteStateB;-- concreteStateC.jsconst State = require('./state');class ConcreteStateC extends State {    constructor() {        super();        console.log('ConcreteStateC constructor.');    };    handle(context) {        console.log('Current State: ConcreteStateC. ');        context.setState('ConcreteStateA');    };}module.exports = ConcreteStateC;-- states.jsconst ConcreteStateA = require('./concreteStateA');const ConcreteStateB = require('./concreteStateB');const ConcreteStateC = require('./concreteStateC');module.exports = {    ConcreteStateA,    ConcreteStateB,    ConcreteStateC};-- context.jsconst states = require('./states');class Context {    constructor(state = 'ConcreteStateA') {        this.state = state;        console.log('Context constructor.');    }    setState(state) {        this.state = state;    };    request() {        new states[this.state]().handle(this);    };}module.exports = Context;-- client.jsconst Context = require('./context');const context = new Context();context.request();context.request();context.request();context.request();
